item.title: 泰晤士报》报道：为规避中国关税，沃尔沃将电动汽车生产转移至比利时
item.description: 据英国《泰晤士报》周六报道，沃尔沃汽车公司已开始将中国产电动汽车的生产转移到比利时，因为预计欧盟将继续打击由北京补贴的进口汽车。【原文：Volvo cars has started to shift production of Chinese-made electric vehicles to Belgium in the expectation that the European Union will drive ahead with a crackdown on Beijing-subsidised imports, the Times reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 马斯克：特斯拉今年不会推出新款 Model Y
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周六在社交媒体 X 上发文称，特斯拉今年将不会推出新款 Model Y。【原文：Tesla will not launch a refreshed Model Y this year, chief executive Elon Musk said in a post on social media X on Saturday.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，克莱斯勒将因软件故障在美国召回超过 211,000 辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周六表示，由于软件故障可能导致电子稳定性控制系统失效，克莱斯勒将在美国召回超过21.1万辆汽车。【原文：Chrysler is recalling more than 211,000 vehicles in the United States due to a software malfunction that could disable the electronic stability control system, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Saturday.】

item.title: 维珍银河航天飞机载游客飞行
item.description: 理查德-布兰森（Richard Branson）创办的维珍银河公司（Virgin Galactic）周六表示，四名游客乘坐该公司的太空飞机飞往太空边缘并返回，这是今年的第二次飞行。【原文：Virgin Galactic flew four tourists to the edge of space and back aboard its spaceplane, marking the second flight this year, the Richard Branson-founded company said on Saturday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，阿美石油公司一半以上的股份出售给了外国投资者
item.description: 两名知情人士周六告诉路透社，沙特阿拉伯将阿美石油公司 112 亿美元股份销售额的一半以上出售给了外国投资者。【原文：Saudi Arabia placed over half of an $11.2 billion share sale in Aramco with foreign investors, two people with knowledge of the matter told Reuters on Saturday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行霍尔茨曼对利率前景持谨慎态度
item.description: 欧洲央行决策者罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）周六表示，在欧洲央行本周下调基准利率后，现在判断欧洲央行是否已开始转向降低借贷成本还为时尚早。【原文：It is too early to tell whether the European Central Bank has initiated a shift towards lower borrowing costs after it cut its benchmark interest rate this week, ECB policymaker Robert Holzmann said on Saturday.】

item.title: 据天空新闻报道，电影世界计划出售部分英国影院业务
item.description: 天空新闻（Sky News）周六援引未透露姓名的消息来源报道称，电影世界正在就可能的出售进行谈判，作为战略审查的一部分，这可能会导致其业务的全面重组。【原文：Cineworld is in talks over a possible sale as part of a strategic review that could lead to a wholesale restructuring of its business, Sky News reported on Saturday, citing unidentified sources.】

item.title: 独家报道沃尔玛反对在店内增加紧急按钮
item.description: 零售巨头沃尔玛表示，反对在商店里安装紧急按钮--纽约的购物者可能很快就会在货架上发现这种物品。【原文：Retail giant Walmart says it is against putting panic buttons in stores - an item shoppers in New York may soon find on shelves.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金将投票反对马斯克 560 亿美元的特斯拉薪酬方案
item.description: 挪威 1.7 万亿美元的主权财富基金周六表示，将投票反对批准特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）560 亿美元的薪酬方案。【原文：Norway's $1.7 trillion sovereign wealth fund said on Saturday it will vote against ratifying Tesla CEO Elon Musk's $56 billion pay package, which is up for a shareholder vote next week, after a Delaware judge invalidated it earlier this year.】

item.title: 文件显示，伯克希尔增持 257 万股西方石油公司股票
item.description: 据一份美国证券文件显示，沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）在 6 月 5 日至 7 日期间购买了西方石油公司（Occidental Petroleum）约 257 万股普通股。【原文：Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway bought around 2.57 million shares of common stock in Occidental Petroleum over June 5-7, according to a U.S. securities filing.】

item.title: 新日铁高管看到了美国钢铁公司工人和其他人的积极反应
item.description: 新日铁副董事长森隆弘（Takahiro Mori）本周会见了美国钢铁公司的员工和社区领袖，以更好地了解新日铁收购美国钢铁公司的提议。【原文：Nippon Steel Vice Chairman Takahiro Mori met with U.S. Steel's employees and community leaders this week to gain better understanding of its proposed acquisition of the U.S. company and saw positive reaction, a company spokesperson said.】

item.title: CrowdStrike、KKR、GoDaddy 将加入标普 500 指数基准行列
item.description: S&P 道琼斯指数公司周五表示，私募股权公司 KKR & Co、网络安全公司 CrowdStrike 和互联网服务提供商 GoDaddy 将在 6 月 24 日股市开盘前加入基准 S&P 500 指数。【原文：The S&P Dow Jones Indices said on Friday that private equity firm KKR & Co , cybersecurity company CrowdStrike and internet services provider GoDaddy will join the benchmark S&P 500 before markets open on June 24.】

item.title: 夏莉-雷德斯通在派拉蒙董事会选举中得票最少
item.description: 周五提交的一份文件显示，派拉蒙全球公司控股股东莎莉-雷德斯通（Shari Redstone）在公司董事会选举中获得的选票是其他董事中最少的。【原文：Paramount Global controlling shareholder Shari Redstone received the fewest votes among other directors in the company's board election, a filing on Friday showed.】

item.title: 独家：沃尔玛高管称，沃尔玛旗下 Flipkart 和 PhonePe 的 IPO 可能需要几年时间
item.description: 沃尔玛的一位高管表示，沃尔玛旗下的 Flipkart 市场和 PhonePe 数字支付平台的首次公开募股可能需要几年时间。【原文：Initial public offerings of Walmart's Flipkart marketplace and PhonePe digital payments platform could take a couple of years, a Walmart executive said.】

item.title: 美国联邦通信委员会要求移交对网络中立性的质疑
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会周五要求美国第六巡回上诉法院将业界对其恢复具有里程碑意义的网络中立规则的决定提出的一系列法律挑战移交给华盛顿特区的一家联邦法院。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission on Friday asked the U.S. 6th Circuit Court of Appeals to transfer a series of industry legal challenges to its decision to reinstate landmark net neutrality rules to a federal court in Washington, D.C.】

item.title: 香奈儿进入新篇章，奢侈品价格成为焦点
item.description: 周四早些时候，香奈儿首席设计师的离职在价值 1.62 万亿美元的奢侈品行业激起了涟漪，而此时全球所有主要奢侈品公司都正处于十字路口。【原文：The departure of Chanel's top designer early Thursday sent ripples across the $1.62 trillion luxury goods industry at a time when all the major global players are at a crossroads.】

item.title: 新闻速递一些美国议员呼吁加强对源自中国的新闻应用程序的审查
item.description: 路透社报道 NewsBreak 起源于中国，并使用人工智能工具制作错误新闻后，三位美国议员呼吁对 NewsBreak 进行更严格的审查。【原文：Three U.S. lawmakers have called for more scrutiny of NewsBreak, a popular news aggregation app in the United States after Reuters reported it has Chinese origins and has used artificial intelligence tools to produce erroneous stories.】

item.title: 研究发现，辉瑞公司的 Paxlovid 不能作为长效 COVID 的 15 天治疗药物
item.description: 根据斯坦福大学研究人员的一项研究，辉瑞公司的 COVID-19 抗病毒治疗药物 Paxlovid 的 15 天疗程并不能缓解长效 COVID 的症状。【原文：A 15-day course of Pfizer's COVID-19 antiviral treatment Paxlovid did not relieve symptoms of long COVID, according a study by Stanford University researchers.】

item.title: 美国寻求为战略石油储备提供 600 万桶石油
item.description: 美国周五发出两份招标书，为战略石油储备购买总计 600 万桶原油，这是乔-拜登总统的政府继 2022 年的历史性销售之后对战略石油储备的补充。【原文：The U.S. issued two solicitations on Friday to buy a total of 6 million barrels of crude oil for the Strategic Petroleum Reserve as the administration of President Joe Biden replenishes the stockpile following a historic sale in 2022.】

item.title: 美联储数据显示：第一季度美国家庭财富再创新高
item.description: 美联储周五的数据显示，得益于股市创纪录的上涨和房地产的收益，2024 年前三个月美国家庭财富增至创纪录的 160 万亿美元以上。【原文：U.S. household wealth rose to a record of more than $160 trillion in the first three months of 2024 thanks to the stock market's record run and gains in real estate, Federal Reserve data showed on Friday.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 通胀和美联储会议将为美国市场走向提供线索
item.description: 投资者将密切关注下周的通胀数据和美联储会议，以寻找推动股市屡创新高的软着陆希望是否仍然合理的线索。【原文：Investors will closely watch next week’s inflation numbers and Federal Reserve meeting for clues on whether the soft landing hopes that drove stocks to record highs are still justified.】

item.title: 美国卡车和 SUV 燃油经济性新规定远不及最初提议的严格
item.description: 一家联邦机构表示，乔-拜登总统的政府周五最终确定了到 2031 年针对卡车和运动型多用途车的更严格的燃油经济性规定，但这些规定并不像其最初提议的那样严格。【原文：President Joe Biden's administration on Friday finalized tighter fuel economy rules for trucks and sport utility vehicles through 2031 that are not as stringent as it first proposed, a federal agency said.】

item.title: 医疗支付公司 Waystar 在纳斯达克上市后股价下跌 2
item.description: Waystar 周五在纳斯达克全球精选市场首次上市时，股价比首次公开发行价下跌了 2.3%，这家医疗支付公司的估值为 35 亿美元。【原文：Shares of Waystar fell 2.3% below their initial public offering price in their Nasdaq Global Select Market debut on Friday, giving the healthcare payments company a valuation of $3.50 billion.】

item.title: Yelp 可起诉承诺压制差评的声誉公司
item.description: Yelp 可以提起诉讼，指控一家声誉管理公司欺诈性地宣传其能够从商业评论网站上删除 "差评"。【原文：Yelp can pursue a lawsuit accusing a reputation management company of fraudulently advertising its ability to remove "bad" reviews from the business review website.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，沃尔格林搁置博姿上市计划
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士的话报道，由于出售谈判仍在继续，沃尔格林博姿联盟已搁置了对其英国博姿连锁药店进行首次公开募股的计划。【原文：Walgreens Boots Alliance has shelved plans for a potential initial public offering of its UK-based Boots drugstore chain as sale talks continue, Bloomberg News reported on Friday citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 安联集团前员工承认因 70 亿美元基金崩溃而犯有欺诈罪
item.description: 据检察官称，COVID-19 大流行病引发了私人投资基金的崩溃，造成了 70 亿美元的投资者损失。【原文：A former Allianz fund manager pleaded guilty on Friday over his role in a meltdown of private investment funds sparked by the COVID-19 pandemic, and which according to prosecutors caused $7 billion of investor losses.】

item.title: 巴西央行因担忧市场通胀预期而进行调整
item.description: 巴西央行行长罗伯托-坎波斯-内托周五表示，尽管数据显示通胀有所缓和，但金融市场对高通胀的预期仍然很高，他对此表示担忧，其他央行官员也表达了同样的观点。【原文：Brazil's central bank chief, Roberto Campos Neto, expressed concern on Friday that financial markets were still expecting high inflation despite data showing moderation, a view echoed by other bank officials.】

item.title: 因安全气囊问题，Stellantis 将预防性召回范围扩大至其他车型
item.description: 汽车制造商斯泰兰特的发言人周五告诉路透社，斯泰兰特已经预防性地扩大了对安全气囊可能有问题的汽车的召回范围，包括更多的雪铁龙和DS车型，以及欧宝品牌。【原文：Car maker Stellantis has preventively extended a recall of vehicles with potentially faulty airbags to more Citroen and DS models, as well as the Opel brand, spokespeople for the carmaker told Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 特斯拉反对向撤销马斯克薪酬的律师支付 56 亿美元赔偿金
item.description: 电动汽车制造商埃隆-马斯克周五在法庭文件中争辩说，撤销埃隆-马斯克创纪录的特斯拉薪酬福利的法律团队只应得到他们要求的 56 亿美元律师费中的一小部分，因为他们的诉讼几乎没有给公司带来任何好处。【原文：The legal team that voided Elon Musk's record Tesla pay package deserves a tiny fraction of the $5.6 billion legal fee they requested because their lawsuit provided almost no benefit for the company, the electric automaker argued in court papers on Friday.】

item.title: 威士卡和万事达卡在英国面临新的商户收费诉讼
item.description: 全球支付处理商威士（Visa）和万事达（Mastercard）必须面对新一轮有关向零售商收费的诉讼，因为伦敦一家法庭周五裁定，代表商家提起的集体诉讼可以继续进行。【原文：Global payments processors Visa and Mastercard must face a new set of lawsuits over fees charged to retailers, after a London tribunal ruled on Friday that collective cases brought on behalf of merchants can proceed.】
